item.name: Murrindindi Vineyards
item.description: This small winery is owned and run by the Cuthbertson family, established by Alan and Jan as a minor diversification from their cattle property. Plantings began in 1978, increasing in 82 and 95 to their present level. Son Hugh, himself with a long and high-profile wine career, has overseen the marketing of the wines, including the Family Reserve and Dont Tell Dad brands. Exports to the UK, the US, Finland, Estonia and China.
